p: Plasmids were transformed into BL21 (DE3) pLysS competent E. coli. 0.4 mM IPTG was added to the bacterial cultures when OD 600 of the cultures reached 0.6–0.8 for induction of protein expression. Bacterial cultures were incubated overnight at 18°C and 21°C for PB2 cap-binding domain and NP respectively. Proteins were purified as described previously [ 26, 32]. Cells were harvested and lysed by sonication, His-tagged proteins expressed were captured by Ni-sepharose (GE Healthcare) and further purified by size exclusion chromatography.
